task_description:
# Hardcoded documents list in Equipment drawer

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-15](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-15/hardcoded-documents-list-in-equipment-drawer)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The Equipment details drawer shows hardcoded mock document list instead of real files.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/EquipmentPage.tsx (lines 209-214)

**Current Code:**

```typescript
<ListItem>
  <ListItemText primary="Technical Specifications" secondary="PDF - 2.4 MB" />
</ListItem>
```

**Expected Behavior:**

* Fetch actual files from /projects/{id}/files API
* Display real file names and sizes
* Show empty state if no documents

**Priority:** Medium
